name: Nothing Squared BETA V1.0
description:
Nothing² is in Early Release and is being actively developed. 

The Nothing has invaded your world and even your entire universe. Travel across space and time jumping over and dodging the Nothing's power. Skillfully traverse the worlds you never knew existed and unlock their secrets in pursuit of ending the Nothing's reign over the universe.

This game is compatible with a gamepad/controller.

Controls:

Left/Right: Left/Right, D-Pad Left/D-Pad Right, Left Stick

Jump: Up, Space, Xbox A, DualShock Cross

Restart: R, Xbox Y, DualShock Triangle

This game is in active Development to expand the number of levels and worlds. There is currently no music or SFX but those will be added at a later date.
